title: WTT: My T205 Mathewson for your E93 Mathewson
author: scmavl

posts.post_title: WTT: My T205 Mathewson for your E93 Mathewson
posts.post_content:
I'd like to trade my T205 Matty for an E93 in similar condition (PSA/SGC 1.5-2.5). My copy has great color and perfect registration. Thanks!

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2nEAdbW][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/52288886330_ab395b74db.jpg[/img][/url]
